creator: prajaktaq@yahoo.com
text:
I am trying to run apache with cygwin. I followed the install steps but finally when I start apache, I get the error - httpd: bad user name daemon

What could be the possible reason and how do I solve it?
Please read the httpd.conf configuration and change the server configuration to be whatever user name and group name that cygwin will let you use.
creator: fielding@apache.org
